name: Terrible Tundra
description:
A board game retheme of Forbidden Desert made as a learning exercise.

Search the frozen map for the parts of your flying snowmobile and get back to the take off area before you  run out of food or get buried by the blizzard.

This is a Beta build with placeholder art and in need of some polish but the game is 100% playable. If you come across any bugs let me know in the comments
